processingCommand.script:
IF "${FormatFileConfig}"=="" GOTO SKIPSTEP
Echo on
E:\Timescape\Tools\FormatFile\FormatFile.exe -x:"${FormatFileConfig}"
Echo Off
set retcode=%errorlevel%
echo FormatFile ended with return code: %retcode%
IF %retcode% EQU 0 GOTO NORMALFLOW
GOTO ERRORFLOW
:NORMALFLOW
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:ERRORFLOW
set resexe=1
GOTO END
:SKIPSTEP
Echo FormatConfigFile variable is not defined, step is skipped
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:END
exit %resexe%
